attributes.action: Deport all of the Immigrants in UK prisons to their home countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Deport all of the criminals in UK Prisons to their home countries.
They make up roughly 10% of the prison population in the UK. They have been given a chance to live by UK Law and respect her citizens but have exploited us. Deport them so they realize we are not a soft nation and release the burden on the UK Tax payer , who fund their upkeep.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
